text: Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:1970 establishments in the United States Urban Outfitters is a multinational lifestyle retail corporation. It was founded in 1970. It targets young adults with a merchandise mix of women's and men's fashion apparel, footwear, beauty and wellness products, accessories, activewear and gear, and housewares, as well as music, primarily vinyl records and cassettes. It is headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
title: Urban Outfitters
